document.full_text: a military court in bahrain on thursday convicted four shiite protesters and sentenced them to death for the killing of two policemen during anti-government demonstrations last month in the gulf kingdom, state media said.
document.title: bahrain sentences 4 shiite protesters to death
lines_and_colors: a military court in bahrain on thursday convicted four shiite protesters and sentenced them to death for the killing of two policemen during anti-government demonstrations last month in the gulf kingdom, state media said.
